tool_description: Weather API supporting current weather, forecasting, and more
name: InteraWeather
title: InteraWeather

api_list.name: astronomy
api_list.description: Returns astronomy data for the given location (and optionally, time).

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The location, can be a US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: The date to check in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to the current date.

schema.description: Astronomy information for a given date

region.description: The region this location is in

country.description: The country this location is in

phase.description: The phase the moon is in

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Returns locations that match the searched value.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The location, can be a US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name.

api_list.name: airquality
api_list.description: Returns the air quality metrics for a location including particulate matter and atmospheric gas composition.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The location, can be a US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name.

datetime_epoch.description: The date time in the form of a unix epoch

is_day.description: Is it day time at this location?

last_updated_epoch.description: The date time in the form of a unix epoch

last_updated.description: The date time string the data was last updated

air_quality.description: The air quality at the location

gbDEFRAIndex.description: UK DEFRA Daily Air Quality Index (DAQI)

api_list.name: currentWeather
api_list.description: Returns the weather at a given location.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The location, can be a US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name.

api_list.name: validWeatherConditions
api_list.description: Returns a list of all weather conditions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://interaweather.p.rapidapi.com/api/weather/conditions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interaweather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://interaweather.p.rapidapi.com/api/weather/conditions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interaweather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: forecastWeather
api_list.description: Returns the weather forecast for a given location.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The location, can be a US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name.

optional_parameters.name: days
optional_parameters.description: The number of days to forecast, maximum of 3.

datetime_epoch.description: The date time in the form of a unix epoch

is_day.description: Is it day time at this location?

last_updated_epoch.description: The date time in the form of a unix epoch

last_updated.description: The date time string the data was last updated

datetime_epoch.description: The date time in the form of a unix epoch

is_day.description: Is it day time at this location?

last_updated_epoch.description: The date time in the form of a unix epoch

last_updated.description: The date time string the data was last updated

mph.description: Wind speed in miles per hour

kph.description: Wind speed in kilometers per hour

mph.description: Wind gust speed in miles per hour

kph.description: Wind gust speed in kilometers per hour

enum: Moderate or heavy showers of ice pellets
Moderate or heavy rain with thunder
Moderate or heavy snow with thunder

day.description: A weather object for daily forecast

enum: Moderate or heavy showers of ice pellets
Moderate or heavy rain with thunder
Moderate or heavy snow with thunder
